name: Sarah Zelikovitz
content: Sarah Zelikovitz Home Page Sarah Zelikovitz, PhD Professor, Department of Computer Science College of Staten Island of CUNY sarah.zelikovitz@csi.cuny.edu Spring 2025 Introduction to Computer Science CSC126 See Blackboard site for the course. Spring 2023 Introduction to Computer Science CSC126 See Blackboard site for the course. Data Mining CSc 84040 Fall 2022 Introduction to Computer Science CSC126 See Blackboard site for the course. This class also uses DataCamp that provides university access to 350+ courses on data science and analytics. Data Structures CSC 326 Discrete Mathematics CSC 228 Artificial Intelligence and Knowledge Engineering CSC 731 Undergraduate Advisement Procedures Fill out the degree checklist before your advisement appointment, and bring it with you. Compare your checklist with Degree Works. Find Checklists Here Flowcharts and Prereqs Prof Zelikovitz Office Hours Fall 2025: 1N 212. If you cannot make it in person, please send an email and I will respond with a zoom link. Tues 11:10PM-12:10PM, Thursday 12:10-2:00pm or by appointment. I can also meet later on Tuesday/Thursdays. Please send an email. sarah.zelikovitz@csi.cuny.edu Research Google Scholar Publications S Marcus, D Sokol and S Zelikovitz, 2d Side-Sharing Tandems with Mismatches, In: Liptak, Z., Moura, E., Figueroa, K., Baeza-Yates, R.
